accountVerification.text:
Please take a picture of the required documents.
They must be high quality pictures, the documents must be clear and readable.
Please don't upload blurry pictures.
accountVerification.title: ACCOUNT VERIFICATION

common.onBoard:
Send a parcel quickly with 
a courier of LWF Network or 
become a courier and immediatly 
make money with deliveries

errors.linkExpiredMessage:
We are sorry but your activation link is expired.
Please click the button to try again to signup.

form.confirmMobileMessage:
We sent an SMS with a confirmation code
to the provided mobile number.
Enter the code in the verification field.
form.emailError: A valid e-mail address is required
form.mobileError2: Mobile number must be between 10 and 13 digits
form.passwordError2: Password must be at least 8 characters long
